PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-08092017-06-20,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
SubjectIssuance of Licence GL-336 - Seneca Resources Corporation
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCE GL-336, by the National Energy Board to SENECA RESOURCES CORPORATION in order to import natural gas until December 31, 2023. The point of import into Canada will be Niagara Falls and Chippawa, Ontario.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
